name: Sense & Recoil In Fear
Text: 'USED: Target your highest-ability character and one just-played Interrupt. Draw destiny. If destiny < ability of target character, cancel target Interrupt.LOST: Use 3 Force. Each player counts cards in hand, then places entire hand and Used Pile onto Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Each player then draws from Reserve Deck the counted number of cards to create a new hand.',
